• The Center for Biological Diversity said the proposals were “a death sentence for wolverines, monarchs, but but not monarchs”

items.title: The Cambodian women rising up to protect their communal land

• The area was once home to 50 freshwater ponds - sources of drinking water, food and livelihood to those nearby
